languages.text: Человек, именуемый Пощадой, не простил унижения, которое ему довелось стерпеть от Джай Хейдари. Подозрительным образом все люди, к которым она испытывала симпатию, гибли при несчастливых стечениях обстоятельств, и горечь бесконечных утрат отравила ее сердце. Лишь для одного человека была сделано исключение, и имя {mf|его|ее} — {name} фон Валанциус.

The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Человек, именуемый Пощадой, не простил унижения, которое ему довелось стерпеть от Джай Хейдари. Подозрительным образом все люди, к которым она испытывала симпатию, гибли при несчастливых стечениях обстоятельств, и горечь бесконечных утрат отравила ее сердце. Лишь для одного человека была сделано исключение, и имя {mf|его|ее} — {name} фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: A person under the name of Mercy did not forget the humiliation he suffered from Jae Heydari. In some strange manner, everyone who incited her affection died under some unfortunate circumstances. The sorrow of her never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person was the exception to this rule, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valanscus.

A person under the name of Mercy did not forget the humiliation he suffered from Jae Heydari. In some strange manner, everyone who incited her affection died under some unfortunate circumstances. The sorrow of her never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person was the exception to this rule, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valanscus.

The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. There was only exception to this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. There was only exception to this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: 那个被称为“悯慈”的人，永远不会忘记他在婕伊·海达利手中遭受的羞辱。婕伊喜欢过的每个人，最终都会以某种悲剧性的方式神秘死亡。永不停歇的死亡让她的内心充满了悲伤，只有一个人避开了这样的结局，{mf|他|她}的名字叫做{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。
languages.original_text: The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 那个被称为“悯慈”的人，永远不会忘记他在婕伊·海达利手中遭受的羞辱。婕伊喜欢过的每个人，最终都会以某种悲剧性的方式神秘死亡。永不停歇的死亡让她的内心充满了悲伤，但有一个人避开了这样的结局，{mf|他|她}的名字叫做{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。

languages.text: Die als Mercy bekannte Person vergaß niemals die Erniedrigung, die ihr durch Jae Heydari widerfahren war. Jeder, dem sie je Zuneigung entgegenbrachte, sollte merkwürdigerweise auf tragische Art sterben, und die Trauer des immerwährenden Verlusts vergiftete ihr Herz. Nur eine einzige Person entging diesem Schicksal, und das war {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Die als Mercy bekannte Person vergaß niemals die Erniedrigung, die ihr durch Jae Heydari widerfahren war. Jeder, dem sie je Zuneigung entgegenbrachte, sollte merkwürdigerweise auf tragische Art sterben, und die Trauer des immerwährenden Verlusts vergiftete ihr Herz. Es gab nur eine Ausnahme, der dieses Schicksal nicht widerfuhr, und das war {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: Mercy n'oublia jamais l'humiliation que Jae Heydari lui avait infligée. Tous ceux à qui elle témoignait de l'affection mouraient tragiquement dans des circonstances mystérieuses, et la tristesse de ces deuils à répétition empoisonna son cœur. Une seule personne échappa à ce sort : {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Mercy n'oublia jamais l'humiliation que Jae Heydari lui avait infligée. Tous ceux à qui elle témoignait de l’affection mouraient tragiquement dans des circonstances mystérieuses, et la tristesse de ces deuils à répétition empoisonna son cœur. Une seule personne échappa à ce sort : {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: La persona conocida como Mercy nunca olvidó la humillación que sufrió a manos de Jae Heydari. Todas las personas con las que la contrabandista mantuvo algún tipo de relación cercana aparecieron muertas de formas trágicas y misteriosas, y el dolor de la pérdida constante envenenó su corazón. Solo una escapó a ese destino: {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: La persona conocida como Mercy nunca olvidó la humillación que sufrió a manos de Jae Heydari. Todas las personas con las que la contrabandista mantuvo algún tipo de relación cercana aparecieron muertas de formas trágicas y misteriosas, y el dolor de la pérdida constante envenenó su corazón. Solo una escapó a ese destino: {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: マーシーと呼ばれる人物は、ジェイ・ヘイダリの手によって受けた屈辱を決して忘れなかった。ジェイが愛情を注いだ者は皆、何らかの悲劇的な形で不可解な死を遂げたことで、彼女の心は終わりなき喪失の悲しみに蝕まれた。この運命を免れたただ一人の名は、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだった。
languages.original_text: The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: マーシーと呼ばれる人物は、ジェイ・ヘイダリの手によって受けた屈辱を決して忘れなかった。ジェイが愛情を注いだ者は皆、何らかの悲劇的な形で不可解な死を遂げたことで、彼女の心は終わりなき喪失の悲しみに蝕まれた。この運命を免れたただ一人の名は、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだった。

languages.text: Merhamet olarak bilinen şahıs, Jae Heydari yüzünden küçük düştüğü gerçeğini asla unutmadı. Jae'ın ilgi gösterdiği herkes; gizemli ve trajik bir şekilde ölüyor, sonu gelmeyen kayıpların hüznü de Jae'ın kalbini zehirliyordu. Bu kaderden tek bir kişi kaçabildi, onun da adı {name} von Valancius'tu.
languages.original_text: The person known as Mercy never forgot the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Jae Heydari. Everyone she ever showed affection for would mysteriously die in some tragic way, and the sorrow of never-ending loss poisoned her heart. Only one person escaped this fate, and {mf|his|her} name was {name} von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Merhamet olarak bilinen şahıs, Jae Heydari nedeniyle küçük düşmesini asla unutmadı. Jae'ın ilgi gösterdiği herkes gizemli ve trajik bir şekilde ölüyor, sonu gelmeyen kayıpların hüznü kalbini zehirliyordu. Bu kaderden tek bir kişi kaçabildi. İsmi {name} von Valancius'tu.
